_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
Zaahen gains a stack of Determination when he hits an enemy champion with an Attack or Ability (max 12). He gains (l.5% - 3.3% per level) increased Attack Damage per stack.
When filled with Determination, Zaahen doubles the granted Attack Damage, and if he would die, he instead enters Stasis for 4 seconds then revives with (30% - 75% per level) of his max Health.
Zaahen's revive has a (300 - 120 per level) second Cooldown.

Zaahen slashes twice on his next Attack, dealing [[0]] and restoring [[1]].

[[2]]: Zaahen's next Attack deals [[3]] and [[4]] the target Up for 0.75 seconds.
Zaahen stabs in a direction. dealing [[0]] to enemies hit, then [[1]] them toward him, dealing [[2]].

Zaahen dashes then slices around himself, dealing [[0]] to nearby enemies.

Enemies at the edge of the slice take [[1]] instead.

text.text: 60/90/120/150/180 {{0}} +4/5/6/7/8% of their maximum Health as magic damage

_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
[[0]]: Zaahen gains [[1]].

[[2]]: Zaahen rises, gaining 50% Damage Reduction while casting.

Zaahen then stabs downward, dealing [[3]] and [[4]].

text.text: restoring 33% of the damage dealt to enemy champions as Health
